heading: Sieges.
general-note: Here are entered general historical works on sieges. Works on the various sieges of a particular place are entered under this heading with local subdivision. Works on a specific siege of a particular place are entered under the place with the subdivision. History--Siege, [date].. Works on a specific siege of a particular castle, fort, etc., are entered under its name with the subdivision. Siege, [date].. Technical military works on siege warfare are entered under. Siege warfare..
